page.title: 04Newbold Verdon Village
page.content: Newbold Verdon is a large village with the old village centre of church and old cottages now being at one corner of a long strip type development of council estates and further S.E, two large private estates. There is a large doctors' practice and a chemist. Shops include two shoe warehouses and two fish and chip shops. There is a miners institute and also a working mens club, various clubs and activites are arranged at the primary school under the auspices of the community college, Desford.
